entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 11:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
